title: Community Edition v1.80.0 — status update & triage of 830 issues
author: robertpopa22
body_snippet:
## Summary

Following [v1.79.0](https://github.com/orgs/mRemoteNG/discussions/3131) (26 fixes), we've completed a full triage of all 830 open issues and are working on **v1.80.0** with self-contained builds and additional fixes.

### v1.80.0 highlights
- **Self-contained .NET build** — no runtime install needed (addresses #2681, #2998)
- **Monitor connect/disconnect resize** — RDP sessions auto-resize (#2142)
- **#3044 fix iteration** — batch file comma-splitting in passwords fully resolved
- **...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
## v1.80.0 Released

**Download:** https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/releases/tag/v1.80.0

6 builds available (x64/x86/ARM64 × framework-dependent + self-contained).

Key additions since v1.79.0:
- Self-contained build variant (no .NET runtime needed)
- `%PUTTYSESSION%` external tool token (#2046)
- Options panel cancel/revert fix (#2914, #2910)
- SQL Server options field enable fix (#2913)
- Batch file password comma fix (#3044)
- RDP auto-resize on monitor change (#2142)

Full changelo...
